meanings.definition: A person who has an extreme fear of spiders.
meanings.sent1: Arachnophobics often feel scared when they see a spider.
meanings.sent2: Many arachnophobics avoid going into the basement because they fear spiders.
meanings.sent3: The arachnophobics at the picnic screamed and ran when a tiny spider crawled near them.
meanings.sent4: Her brother is such an arachnophobics that he sees a spider and thinks it's a monster.
meanings.sent5: The movie about giant spiders was a nightmare for arachnophobics.

meanings.sent1: Arachnophobics may experience panic attacks when they encounter a spider.
meanings.sent2: Some arachnophobics seek therapy to overcome their fear of spiders.
meanings.sent3: The arachnophobics in the haunted house screamed even before seeing any fake spiders.
meanings.sent4: To arachnophobics, a tiny spider can seem as terrifying as a giant monster.
meanings.sent5: The arachnophobics in the group refused to enter the spider exhibit at the zoo.

meanings.definition: Individuals with a phobia of arachnids.
meanings.sent1: Arachnophobics may feel anxious even at the mention of spiders.
meanings.sent2: Many arachnophobics have nightmares about spiders crawling on them.
meanings.sent3: The arachnophobics in the movie theater screamed when a spider appeared on the screen.
meanings.sent4: For arachnophobics, a harmless spider can trigger intense fear and panic.
meanings.sent5: The arachnophobics in the support group shared their experiences of overcoming their fear of spiders.
